message.content:
{"id": "3622", "title": "Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message", "description": "Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has a confusing message. When invoking the New Java Package wizard, before typing anything, a message appears at the top stating - 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'. However, at this point, the package name field is empty. The user is unsure of what this message means and if it is an error. Notes from the conversation:
EG (5/1/2001 5:53:41 AM) - There should be no error message when the package name field is empty and Finish should be disabled.
MA (5/2/01 9:34:00 AM) - It is a warning. I will remove the message.
EG (5/2/01 9:43:44 AM) - Issue: How to create a default package? It can't be created by the user since it is always there.", "OB": "When invoking the New Java Package wizard, a message appears at the top stating 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' even when the package name field is empty. This message should not be shown unless the package name field is populated.", "EB": "The message stating 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' should only be shown if the package name field is populated.", "SR": "Remove the message stating 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' when the package name field is empty. Only show the message if the package name field is populated."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '3622', 'title': 'Bug 3622New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)', 'description': 'Bug 3622New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O) ', 'OB': 'Invoke New Java Package.Result: Before you type anything the following message appears at the top: "A foldercorresponding to the package name already exists".At this point my package name fieldis empty.What does this message mean?Is this an error?If so, should it be displayed inred with the error icon?NOTES:EG (5/1/2001 5:53:41 AM)there should be no error message when the package name field is empty andfinish should be disabled.MA (5/2/01 9:34:00 AM)It is a warning.I will remove the messageEG (5/2/01 9:43:44 AM)issue how to create a default package?It can\'t be created by the user since it always there. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
